skill.name: Murmurs of Wisdom
skill.value: Reduces all enemies' defense by 1020/1220 for a limited time.

ability.name: Supreme Sage (Lv. 31)
ability.value: Slightly increases all allies' crit rate.

ability.name: Socratic Method (Lv. 76)
ability.value: Restore HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.
